name: Hull House
description:
tl;dr Hull house is an arcade game where you have to hull stuff. Self-explanatory.

Ok now here's the rest of the text:

You're a warehouse employee working for a company called "The Hull House." Your task is to drag boxes in a conveyer belt and prevent them from hitting the fire. The game gets more stressful the longer you play. How long will you last before you lose all your lives?

Donations are not necessary, but if you want to support me you can drop a dollar!
